Description: Proconnesian marble statue of the Emperor Marcus Aurelius (AD 161-180) wearing the toga.
Bibliographic references: Sculpture / Catalogue of Greek Sculpture in the British Museum (1906)
Fluck et al. 2015 / Egypt: Faith after the Pharaohs (p.50)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2021 - 2022 27 Apr – 16 Jan, Madrid, Caixa Forum, “Human Image” 2022 16 Feb – 29 May, Seville, Caixa Forum, “Human Image” 2022 28 Jun - 9 Oct, Zaragoza, Caixa Forum, “Human Image” 2022 -2023 22 Nov - 9 Apr, Palma, Caixa Forum, “Human Image” 2023 4 July - 22 Oct, Barcelona, Caixa Forum, “Human Image”
Acquisition name: Donated by: George III, King of the United Kingdom
